ListEmailRecipientSource.name: ListEmailRecipientSource
ListEmailRecipientSource.description: For a list email in Salesforce, represents the dynamically defined sources of recipient email addresses. Each record represents a link to a single list view or campaign that is examined when the list email is sent. Has a one-to-many relationship with ListEmail.

ListEmailId.description: The related list email record. Required on record creation; read-only otherwise.

Name.description: The auto-generated name of the list email recipient source.

SourceListId.description: Required. The id of a list view to send the list email to. Read-only except when list email is in draft state.

SourceType.description: Required. Read-only except when list email is in draft state.
